text: Toast is a studio album by American post-hardcore band Tar, released in 1993 through Touch and Go Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ===Performers=== *John Mohr - Guitar, vocals *Mark Zablocki - Guitar *Tom Zaluckyj - Bass *Mike Greenlees - Drums ===Production=== *Bob Hanson - Photography *David Lounsbury - Recording for "The French Horn" ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 albums
title: Toast (Tar album)
